Description: Mitome Saisaki (再埼みとめ, Saisaki Mitome) is a werewolf who works at the Hearsay Police Department with Koyomi Araragi as an adult.

#Background.text:
Mitome is a descendant of an ancient wolf clan. She can control her transformations, has a great sense of smell, excels at battling, and is even stronger mentally. 
At one point, she worked as the body guard of Tsubasa Hanekawa.
